data.name: ReadCase
data.value: select distinct T1.NUMB from CKT_CASE T1 join CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 on (T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NUMBER) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (T2.TYPE = 'CH') and (T2.START_DATE <= @startDate) and (T2.END_DATE >= @startDate)

data.name: ReadCaseRoleCsePerson
data.value: select CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (TYPE = 'AP') and (START_DATE <= @startDate) and (END_DATE >= @startDate) and (@casNumber = CAS_NUMBER)
